alert.note: Alert for Marion; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 6:51PM CDT until August 09 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Marion, Walker and Winston. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 651 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hamilton, Lynn, Arley, Double Springs, Brilliant, Nauvoo, Lake Buttahatchee, Ashbank, Brinn, Houston Recreational Area, Poplar Springs, Camp McDowell, Corinth Rec Area, Falls City, Smith Lake, Weston, Curry, Natural Bridge, Delmar and Piney Grove.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
